repositories.description: psychoPATH - hunting file uploads & LFI in the dark. This tool is a customisable payload generator designed for blindly detecting LFI & web file upload implementations allowing to write files into the webroot (aka document root). The "blind" aspect is the key here and is inherent to dynamic testing usually conducted with no access to the source â€¦
